meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>crystal</kanji> <kanji>ladle</kanji> is the Japanese given name <vocabulary>Eito</vocabulary>. If you know the singer-songwriter Eito, imagine him holding a crystal ladle. If not, any Eito will do! Other public figures with the name include pro baseball player Tanaka Eito (田中 瑛斗) and Takarazuka actor Namiki Eito (波輝 瑛斗).
readingMnemonic:
This name uses the on'yomi for both kanji, and you learned both these readings with the kanji. Get yourself a crystal ladle to celebrate!

Note: This name can also sometimes be read あきと, as is the case for pro baseball player Takabe Akito (髙部 瑛斗).
